name: s-1980
title: OEPS Data Aggregated by State (1980)
description: This CSV aggregates all 1980 data variables from the OEPS v2 release at the State level.

fields.title: HEROP_ID
fields.name: HEROP_ID
fields.description: A derived unique id corresponding to the relevant geographic unit.
fields.comments: The HEROP_ID is generated as follows: Summary Level Code + "US" + GEOID + “-” + Year. In the case of State geographies, Summary Level Code is 040 and GEOID is State FP .

fields.title: GEOID
fields.name: GEOID
fields.description: Two digit federal information processing standard code.
fields.source_long: Tiger/Line 2018 Shapefiles

fields.title: Total Population
fields.name: TotPop
fields.description: Estimated total population
fields.source_long: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; 2010 Decennial Census; Integrated Public Use Microdata Service National Historic Geographic Information Systems
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from IPUMS NHGIS and aggregated upwards.

fields.title: TotUnits
fields.name: TotUnits
fields.description: Count of total housing units
fields.source_long: American Community Survey 2014-2018 5 Year Estimates; American Community Survey 2008-2012 5-Year Estimates; Social Explorer Historic Census Data on 2010 Geographies
fields.comments: 1980, 1990, and 2000 data from respective decennial censuses downloaded from Social Explorer at county level and aggregated upwards.

fields.title: Age18_64
